author: Sephiko

text: Once again, you've made a great music selection from this great game!  That being said, when are you going to add the best track from the game?  I am of course referring to Mr. Handagote!
author: The0rangeCow

text: Supra, I'm surprised you haven't shown much representation for the sims! especially the first incarnation (which is the second highest selling PC game ever after the sequel). the themes that play when you're in the buy mode are superb! If you're not familiar, i think you should give it a listen sometime =]

text: My favorite puzzle point-and-click game of all time. The audivisual presentation is flawless. Seeing our robot hero and the Pipe Wrench dance to this track once you repair its radio, it instantly brought a smile to my face!
